summary: Ok, the Star Wars fandom is a dumpster fire right now but I just want to share one thing despite the blaster fire that will...
body:
Ok, the Star Wars fandom is a dumpster fire right now but I just want to share one thing despite the blaster fire that will surely be thrown in my direction. 

The Force Awakens was pretty good but I couldn’t take Kylo Ren all that seriously. At some points, I could like with his scene with Han but I mostly just found him a whiny Vader wannabe [which may have been what they were going for initially]

But after The Last Jedi, I no longer feel that way. The film successfully expanded on the character and made me empathize with him. He felt a whole lot more like an actual person without actually taking away the fact he’s a bad guy. [for now] If you ask me, it’s a positive in the film’s favor, no matter what you think of it.

summary: Ok Solo was good. It wasn't fucking dumb like I thought it would be and they did really well on it. Donald Glover was amazing...
body: Ok Solo was good. It wasn’t fucking dumb like I thought it would be and they did really well on it. Donald Glover was amazing and the guy they got for Han …. pulled it off more than I thought he would. I’m still not seeing Ep 9 though.

reblog.comment: Ok Solo was good. It wasn’t fucking dumb like I thought it would be and they did really well on it. Donald Glover was amazing and the guy they got for Han …. pulled it off more than I thought he would. I’m still not seeing Ep 9 though.

trail.content_raw: Ok Solo was good. It wasn’t fucking dumb like I thought it would be and they did really well on it. Donald Glover was amazing and the guy they got for Han …. pulled it off more than I thought he would. I’m still not seeing Ep 9 though.
trail.content: Ok Solo was good. It wasn’t fucking dumb like I thought it would be and they did really well on it. Donald Glover was amazing and the guy they got for Han …. pulled it off more than I thought he would. I’m still not seeing Ep 9 though.

summary:
I really hate being in this fandom.
Kelly is Kelly and not Rose. If you didn’t like Rose then it’s YOUR problem.
Kelly didn’t do...
body:
I really hate being in this fandom.

Kelly is Kelly and not Rose. If you didn’t like Rose then it’s YOUR problem.

Kelly didn’t do anything bad, she’s is an angel. She is just trying to make people smile. She just wants to live her dream and doesn’t deserve to have to deal with such bullshit.

Stop making the actor responsible if you didn’t like a character !

I can’t believe that these assholes harassed ANOTHER person out of social media because of the character they’ve played in a movie.

All the actors like Hayden, Jake, Daisy and now Kelly too, that this disgusting fandom has harassed out of public deserve better.

summary:
Sweet Rose, even though I wasn't
enamored with the ending of her & Finn's story, I did enjoy the
journey. Seeing the joy in...
caption: Sweet Rose, even though I wasn’t enamored with the ending of her & Finn’s story, I did enjoy the journey. Seeing the joy in Rose’s face as she saw the wonders of Canto Bight and the Fathiers brought a smile to my face. It really saddens me when people are harassed for doing/being part of something that doesn’t fit some “fan's” vision.

reblog.comment: Sweet Rose, even though I wasn’t enamored with the ending of her & Finn’s story, I did enjoy the journey. Seeing the joy in Rose’s face as she saw the wonders of Canto Bight and the Fathiers brought a smile to my face. It really saddens me when people are harassed for doing/being part of something that doesn’t fit some “fan's” vision.

Seeing the joy in Rose’s face as she saw the wonders of Canto Bight and the Fathiers brought a smile to my face. summary: Even stars burn out [FR] - Drabble n°44 : « Revanche »
title: Even stars burn out [FR] - Drabble n°44 : « Revanche »
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2kSOA27

by Isa_Faradien

Après un voyage mouvementé à bord du “Chimaera” endommagé par les Purrgils, Thrawn reprit ses esprits et ne tarda pas à faire payer à Ezra le prix de la destruction de sa Flotte… et de sa défaite absolument ridicule (on vous félicite pas, Dave Filoni !).

Words: 213, Chapters: 1/1, Language: Français

Series: Part 44 of Even stars burn out [FR]

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types, Star Wars: Rebels
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Characters: Thrawn | Mitth'raw'nuruodo, Ezra Bridger
  • Additional Tags: Drabble, Series Finale, Potential Spoilers (Season 4 Finale), Bridger I swear I would kill you if you were standing right before me, Same thing for you Dave Filoni, Purrgils as Deus Ex Machina… pathetic, Space Whales defeating Grand Admiral Thrawn are you even serious, wtf is this shit, I can totally imagine Timothy Zahn facepalming in the corner of the office, WHAT HAPPENS NEXT (this is my version of the events that follow)


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2kSOA27

summary: Star wars fandom rant
body:
Star wars fandom rant

Currently feeling very frustrated and need somewhere to vent about this lol

so people are getting pretty heated on an instagram post wishing Kathleen Kennedy a happy birthday with relatively nasty comments directed at her and I was trying to post about my experience as a woman in the star wars fandom but apparently instagram automatically blocks any comments being posted that talk about violence or misogyny for ‘violating their community guidelines’ (so fuck you instagram for preventing women from being able to discuss their experiences with your bullshit algorithms)

Anyhoo I’m starting to get really bloody irked with these men who claim they are the true fans of star wars who grew up with it (well fuck off so did we) who hate characters like Rose because she’s not a white man and have bullied Kelly off of social media for DOING HER FUCKING JOB, and then these men defending it with these stupid comments like “oh the star wars community isnt like that its just a few fans!” Then why the fuck do I feel unsafe as a woman in the community of one of my favourite movie franchises which I grew up watching with my dad? Why did I receive rape threats from men and get told I must be on my period just because they disliked that I have an opinion about Luke’s character development? This wasn’t in any particular circle it was just passing through on a YouTube video… I hate that I don’t feel safe to share my love for star wars and partake in the community beyond reblogging a few pictures and playing swtor… I hate the horrific negativity in any discussion about tfa and tlj and im afraid of encountering those kinds of fans again.. These films were supposed to be about fighting this kind of horrific marginalisation at the hands of oppressors (and people have been saying that the empire is being represented as evil white men in movie reviews since the 70s so thats not a fucking new one that these batshit alt righters have come out with) and yet the majority of the people I encounter in this fandom behave exactly like that towards me and other women who participate in the community

blog.name: miloscat
blog.title: MiloScat
blog.description: Subjective game reviews, comic translations, pixel art, and other video game bits & bobs.

summary:
My Star Wars RPG party, low-res pixel style!

I’ve been playing the Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game tabletop RPG with...
caption:
My Star Wars RPG party, low-res pixel style!

I’ve been playing the Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game tabletop RPG with a small group. You start on Jakku some time before TFA and shenanigans inevitably ensue.

This is our party: Mhar’li the brash pilot and blastslinger, Durm Bormo the exiled patriarch and teller of tall tales (that’s me!), Wol Kessix the incompetent Space-French spy (an NPC who stuck around; we gave him the appearance of unused PC Tiras Or’un), and Sherry the cocktail-dispensing droid that the GM gave us after my constant requests for a robot sidekick.

blog.name: yandereplumblossom
blog.title: Under the Plum Tree
blog.description: Welcome to my Tumblr!. I'm a +25 tumbler from Argentina who likes Once Upon a Time, Doctor Who, Jane Austen, Marvel Universe, Harry Potter, Game of Thrones. I also like Anime, such as Naruto, One Piece, Axis Power Hetalia, KHR, and some more. So most of my reblogs are Fandom related, but i also love Fashion and Photography and follow some Good tumblrs about them.  I'm also a Simmer, but hardly post Sim related stuff in here, i have a Simblr with a rather similar name. Thanks for visiting me, see you soon!

summary: Anyways; because i haven’t seen a Rose Tico Appreciation Week on the Planning, and i feel like we need one after such a dreadful...
body: Anyways; because i haven’t seen a Rose Tico Appreciation Week on the Planning, and i feel like we need one after such a dreadful event, have decided to fill my queue for this blog with Kelly Marie Tran and Rose Tico related posts starting today and will try to keep it up until next week.

reblog.comment: Anyways; because i haven’t seen a Rose Tico Appreciation Week on the Planning, and i feel like we need one after such a dreadful event, have decided to fill my queue for this blog with Kelly Marie Tran and Rose Tico related posts starting today and will try to keep it up until next week.
